page.title: 19Holidays, the Pevensey area.
page.content: Pevensey,Westham and Pevensey Bay are very quiet during the winter months, 50% of the population is over retirement age.The population is doubled with summer visitors.The area does not provide all the amusements and amenities of a seaside town,being a{small rural seaside resort,}this is why it is popular with families with young children.The area is also ideal for those who want{a healthy outdoor {life}free from the noise and congestion of large holiday resorts. The land is open and there are well kept public footpaths from which to enjoy it.There is a{wealth of {historical interest}in the many old buildings and links with the past.The aim of the Local Councils is to provide necessary public services,and recreational facilities,but to preserve the{rural athmosphere.
